name: libvirt
description: A Pulumi provider that lets you provision servers on a libvirt host via pulumi.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`libvirt` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-libvirt).

uri.description: libvirt connection URI for operations. See https://libvirt.org/uri.html

provider.description:
The provider type for the libvirt package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

uri.description: libvirt connection URI for operations. See https://libvirt.org/uri.html

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering CloudInitDisk resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering Domain resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering Ignition resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering Network resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering Pool resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering Volume resources.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getNetworkDNSHostTemplate.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getNetworkDNSHostTemplate.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getNetworkDNSSRVTemplate.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getNetworkDNSSRVTemplate.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.
